Html:
Hi,

(Just a tip for those who may face problems while compiling the tutorials provided)

I had to change Content.contentproj for all tutorials as below:

From:
<Import Project="$(MSBuildExtensionsPath)\Microsoft\XNA Game Studio\v2.0\Microsoft.Xna.GameStudio.ContentPipeline.targets" />
To:
<Import Project="$(MSBuildExtensionsPath)\Microsoft\XNA Game Studio\v3.0\Microsoft.Xna.GameStudio.ContentPipeline.targets" />

It seems that the tutorials were built using v2.0, but since I had v3.0 installed I had to do this.

Best Regards.

Hi Caio,

Thanks for letting me know the problem. I will make the fixes and re-post the release later on today.

Ohan

I just replaced the release with the modifications. Sorry for the problem.

Ohan

Hi Ohan,

It was not a big deal to fix that, just a small issue :)

Thanks for considering it.

Best Regards.
Caio C. Moreira.
